Steps.Description: Access the web application and observe the presence of two logos (Xbox and Linux).

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the presence or absence of logos may be influenced by the User-Agent header.
StepDetails.Action: Send a cURL request with the User-Agent header set to 'Linux'.
StepDetails.Result: The Linux logo disappears from the web page.

Steps.Description: Continue exploring the influence of the User-Agent header on the logos.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that the presence of both the Linux and Xbox logos may be required to reveal the flag.
StepDetails.Action: Send a cURL request with the User-Agent header set to 'Linux Xbox'.
StepDetails.Result: The flag is revealed in the body of the HTTP response.
